newpoll:
Creates a new poll. Put details about the poll on different lines like this: 
/newpoll Period e.g. 5m 1h 1d 2M 1y
Name
Description or blank line
Option one
...
Option N
Options can begin with a Law ID such as (QR086A) to enable or disable a law by majority vote.
result:
Shows result for a poll. Either use /result in reply to a poll message or: 
/result Poll ID e.g. [1234ABC]
mine:
Shows all polls from all chats which you are able to vote in.
If you expect to see a poll but it is not visible ensure you have messaged in the group chat since the poll's creation.
law:
Takes a Law ID and shows information about a law, used like: 
/law (xxxx) or xxxx
newlaw:
Creates a new law in this chat. Usage: 
/newlaw Name
Legislation body
laws: /laws shows all the voted on and accepted laws in this chat. /laws all shows all laws in this chat, regardless of if it was voted on or rejected.
quorum: Either calculates the existing quorum or accepts a new quorum function for the group chat.
